bilingual.source: Explore definitions and use new words in context.
bilingual.target: 探索定义并在上下文中使用新词。

bilingual.source: Practise using context clues to guess the meaning of new words.
bilingual.target: 练习使用上下文线索来猜测新词的意思。

bilingual.source: Identify unfamiliar words, explore definitions and use new words in context.
bilingual.target: 识别不熟悉的单词，探索定义并在上下文中使用新单词。

bilingual.source: You need to understand the context of this sentence.
bilingual.target: 你需要理解这个句子的上下文。

bilingual.source: It's easy to misinterpret text messages without context.
bilingual.target: 没有上下文很容易误解短信内容。

bilingual.source: Please provide more context to explain your point.
bilingual.target: 请提供更多的上下文来解释你的观点。

bilingual.source: The meaning of the word is deducible from its context.
bilingual.target: 这个词的意思是从上下文中可推断的。

bilingual.source: In this context, the meaning of the word is clearer.
bilingual.target: 在这个上下文中，这个词的意思更清楚。

bilingual.source: This preface provides important context for the readers.
bilingual.target: 这篇序言为读者提供了重要的上下文。

bilingual.source: In the context of the story, his actions make sense.
bilingual.target: 在故事的上下文中，他的行为是有道理的。

list.abstract: context（英[ˈkɒntekst]，美[ˈkɑːntekst），英语单词，作名词用，为环境；背景；来龙去脉。短语搭配有social context（社会背景；社会环境；社交情境），例句为“When it is separated from context.（当它脱离了上下文）”。 context相关近义词有circumstance、setting、surrounding，形容词为contextual。
ConTEXT，软件名称，软件平台为Win9X/NT/2000/ME。小巧、快速、功能强大的文本编辑工具，特别适合于开发者进行源码编辑。

yingyinNormal.en: In this context, bad might be stronger than good, but only because good is more plentiful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种情况下，坏行为比好行为更强烈，只是因为好行为占多数。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll drop them into the sea. Sink or swim. They're tied up! Exactly! Now there is context.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要把他们扔进海里。或沉或游。他们被绑住了！没错，背景设置好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm not familiar with the acronym KMN from the context, we think it means kill me now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是很清楚"KMN"这个缩写是啥意思。根据语境，我们觉得是"快杀了我吧"。

yingyinNormal.en: Whose coffin, Sherlock? Please, start your deductions. I will apply some context in a moment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁的棺材呢，夏洛克？请开始你的推理。我稍后就提供背景。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to see how that works. So, if you don't mind, I'm going to apply some context to your deductions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很想看看你如何做到。不介意的话，我要给你的推理设置背景。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, the Priya bashing's starting early. Yay! Okay, what's up with those pantsuits? I need some context. Pantsuits suck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么早就开始痛骂普丽娅了，爽！那个西装裤女又怎么了？求解释。西裤套装逊毙了。

yingyinNormal.en: Especially for that reason. The song's melodic line forces me to hear the lyrics in a new context, as misogynistic and nihilistic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是因为这个，歌的旋律线迫使我在新的语境下去听歌词，听到了妇女歧视和虚无主义的意味。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Well, I like the idea of art, the beauty. But only in the right context. Just not as a career. I don't have the necessary talents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，呃，我欣赏艺术的理念，还有它的美，但只是在特定的条件下，但我不想把它当成职业，我自知没有那方面的天分。

yingyinNormal.en: But according to this, you were also experiencing intense grief and suffering. Can you explain those emotions in this context, Maeve? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但根据这些看来,你还经历过强烈的悲伤和痛苦,你能解释下这些情感的来源吗，梅芙？不能。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, I'm no expert here, but I believe in the context of a luncheon invitation, you might want to skip the reference to bowel movements.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，这方面我不在行，不过我相信如果是邀请别人吃午餐，你最好不要说些肠运动的事。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I just think that people when they say that, you know, hate jazz, they just don't have context, they don't know where it comes from.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在想啊,当人们在说你知道的,讨厌爵士乐时。他们只是不懂而已。不知道它从何而来。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps this puts things into context a little bit, Paul, because in the bottom of the valley there, down in the trees there, that is Redbournberry Mill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许这能说明这一点，保罗，因为在山谷的底部，在那些树那里，就是红磨坊。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The better you understand the cultural <highlight>context</highlight>, the more control you can have over your impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你越了解文化背景，就越能控制自己的影响力。

examination_example.sentence: As such, it needed to appreciate the economic realities, the social <highlight>contexts</highlight> and power relations in which each epoch stood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，它需要理解每个时代所处的经济现实、社会背景和权力关系。

examination_example.sentence: We aim to be objective, but we cannot escape the <highlight>context</highlight> of our unique life experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的目标是做到客观，但我们无法摆脱自身独特的生活经验这一背景。

examination_example.sentence: You begin to infer a <highlight>context</highlight> for the text by making decisions about what kind of speech event is involved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你开始通过判断涉及哪种言语事件来推断文本的语境。

examination_example.sentence: If you are unfamiliar with words or idioms, you guess at their meaning, using clues presented in the <highlight>context</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不熟悉单词或习语，你可以根据上下文中的线索猜测它们的意思。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the set of facts or circumstances that surround a situation or event

examination_example.sentence: Those who misunderstand the impact of social interactions may not, in some <highlight>contexts</highlight>, be social enough for their own well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些情况下，那些误解社交互动影响的人可能没有足够的社交能力来维护自己的幸福。

examination_example.sentence: Smart phones offer new tools for achieving these ambitions, providing rich data about everyday behaviors in a variety of <highlight>contexts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 智能手机提供了实现这些目标的新工具，可提供有关各种情况下日常行为的丰富数据。

sense_info_list.en: discourse that surrounds a language unit and helps to determine its interpretation

examination_example.sentence: Pictures or comments on a private page that are taken out of <highlight>context</highlight> could ruin a perfectly good candidate's chances of getting hired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人页面上断章取义的图片或评论可能会毁掉一个非常好的候选人被录用的机会。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the set of facts or circumstances that surround a situation or event

examination_example.sentence: In the current global <highlight>context</highlight>, the ability to tell Chinese stories in English is increasingly important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在当前的全球背景下，用英语讲中国故事的能力变得越来越重要。

examination_example.sentence: Relational closeness, gender, age, and <highlight>context</highlight> that can affect how someone views physical contact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关系的亲密程度、性别、年龄和环境都可能影响一个人对身体接触的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Ideas about learning by doing have struggled to become mainstream educationally, despite being old concepts from Ralph Emerson in the American <highlight>context</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “做中学”的思想一直难以成为主流，尽管这些古老的理念源自美国的 Ralph Emerson。

sense_info_list.en: discourse that surrounds a language unit and helps to determine its interpretation

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the words that come just before and after a word, phrase or statement and help you to understand its meaning

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>context</highlight> doesn't help, look at the parts of the word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果上下文没有帮助，看看单词的部分。

examination_example.sentence: If this doesn't work, take the next step: look at the <highlight>context</highlight> — the other words and sentences around it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这还不行，那就采取下一步:看看上下文——周围的其他单词和句子。
